name: Abhishaike Mahajan
bio:
Abhishaike is a sophomore studying Cognitive Science with concentrations in AI and Neuroscience,
			  and is part of the Collegium V Honors program. He is a Research Assistant in Dr. Kilgard's Neural Engineering
			  lab. Past the sciences, he is heavily invovled in writing culture, being a Staff Editor on one magazine,
			  a previous Staff Writer on another, and the recipient of several national writing awards.
